sn48.54:1.1: “The footprints of all creatures that walk can fit inside an elephant’s footprint, so an elephant’s footprint is said to be the biggest of them all.
sn48.54:1.2: In the same way, the faculty of wisdom is said to be the best of the steps that lead to awakening in terms of becoming awakened.
sn48.54:1.3: And what are the steps that lead to awakening?
sn48.54:1.8: and wisdom are steps that lead to awakening, in that they lead to becoming awakened.
sn48.54:1.9: The footprints of all creatures that walk can fit inside an elephant’s footprint, so an elephant’s footprint is said to be the biggest of them all.
